sentences.sContent: The treatment may bring short-term benefits to AIDS sufferers.
sentences.sCn: 这种疗法对艾滋病患者可能会有短期效果。

sentences.sContent: Most of the staff are on short-term contracts.
sentences.sCn: 大部分职员签的都是短期合同。

sentences.sContent: She’s suffering from short-term memory loss.

remMethod.val: short(短的) + term(期间) → 短期的

trans.tranOther: continuing for only a short time, or relating only to the period that is not very far into the future
